data.what_is:
RollWorks is an Account-Based Platform with ABM and advertising solutions enabling growth-oriented B2B marketers to deeply understand their buyers and rapidly drive business results.

At RollWorks, we get buyers. We've spent 15 years collecting and refining 4.2 billion digital profiles, representing the most comprehensive and trustworthy buyer dataset on the market. We use AI and machine learning to turn buyer data into actionable insights and help customers activate those insights to drive full-funnel outcomes using our exceptional native B2B advertising product and integrations into 24 additional marketing and sales tools. By marrying cutting-edge buyer data, insights, and activation capabilities with our industry-leading ease of use, we enable growth-oriented B2B marketers to deeply understand their buyers and rapidly drive business results.
data.product_description: It's software that takes some of the best marketing tactics you know work--display ads, social ads, triggered emails--and syncs them together to drum up more revenue.Our programmatic advertising technology coupled with our comprehensive account data foundation and machine learning expertise ensure that you can reach known and unknown contacts at your target accounts. With a robust partner ecosystem and an ever-expanding suite of products, we aim to be your account-based marketing platform no matter where you are on your account-based marketing and advertising journey.
data.positioning_against_competitor: Product DescriptionIt's software that takes some of the best marketing tactics you know work--display ads, social ads, triggered emails--and syncs them together to drum up more revenue.Our programmatic advertising technology coupled with our comprehensive account data foundation and machine learning expertise ensure that you can reach known and unknown contacts at your target accounts. With a robust partner ecosystem and an ever-expanding suite of products, we aim to be your account-based marketing platform no matter where you are on your account-based marketing and advertising journey.Seller DetailsSellerNextRollCompany Websitewww.nextroll.comYear Founded2018HQ LocationSan Francisco, CaliforniaTwitter@NextRoll_Inc282 Twitter followersLinkedIn(r) Pagewww.linkedin.com114 employees on LinkedIn(r)DescriptionNextRoll is a marketing technology company delivering products ambitious companies use and rely on to grow their businesses. Powered by machine learning and integrated data platforms, NextRoll's technology serves tens of thousands of businesses globally through its business units: RollWorks, an account-based platform for business-to-business marketing and sales teams, and AdRoll, an ecommerce marketing platform for growing direct-to-consumer brands. NextRoll is a privately-held company headquartered in San Francisco, CA. To learn more visit nextroll.com.ECOverview Provided by:Eric Chavez

features.name: Integrations
features.content: Based on 156 RollWorks Account-Based Platform reviews. Integrates with CRM and marketing automation software to pull contacts for the ability to serve targeted ads based on engagement data.

features.name: Centralization
features.content: Brings together ABM audience creation, management, activation, and measurement all in one centralized platform. 27 reviewers of RollWorks Account-Based Platform have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Account Identification and Segmentation

features.name: Lead-to-Account Matching

features.name: Measurement

features.name: Revenue Analytics

features.name: Campaign Measurement
features.content: Provides the ability to measure how advertising campaigns peformed by showing ad engagement metrics. 163 reviewers of RollWorks Account-Based Platform have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Attribution
features.content: Ability to attribute which digital ads influenced a deal closing, as well as conversions per account as they engage with your website. 148 reviewers of RollWorks Account-Based Platform have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Integrations
features.content: Ability to integrate with other martech software that helps account-based programs, including but not limited to CRM software, marketing automation software, buyer intent data tools, etc. 33 reviewers of RollWorks Account-Based Platform have provided feedback on this feature.

initial_reviews.review_title: Account Based B2B Solution for Personalized Sales
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
The use of targeted online advertising, the ability to do retargeting campaigns and support for online social media channel advertising is really a welcome aspect of how RollWorks can help the small sales team do big things.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
The features of Rollworks are overall very good. Reporting could be improved to be a little more comprehensive and the UI could be improved by making reporting results sortable upon viewing in the UI so as not to export and sort things, this would be a convenience, but the data that is provided is very good overall.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Retargeting ability in RollWorks is really very good. The marketing intelligence that we receive based on our marketing efforts and website analytics helps us target our advertising with laser like focus.  The Bombora database used by Rollworks is really very comprehensive and that makes a big difference in our ability to identify qualified leads quickly. The fact that RollWorks integrates with Salesforce for us makes it a solutions that we can combine our marketing team with our sales team to work effectively with data we were not able to get as effeciently before.

initial_reviews.review_title: A Refreshing ABM Experience
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
One of the best aspects of RollWorks is the integration with HubSpot. As an end-to-end HubSpot user, we're able to pull in signals into our HubSpot dashboards, powering both sales and marketing to be on the same page on who we're targeting and when. From a marketers perspective, Rollworks makes it pretty easy to build playbooks and audiences to target.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I wish we could upload our own HTML5 ads. I understand why we can't but sometimes that adds a few days to the timeline, waiting for those to be populated.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
The biggest issue RollWorks solved for me was that it tells us where to fish and when to fish there. We have a small but mighty team, but if we're going to invest time in outbound and advertising, we might as well make sure they are in-market for an employee advocacy platform. Also, I came from another ABM solution in which the integration with HubSpot was not a true two-way integration. Now it is, and it makes pulling data into HubSpot so much easier for us to review, analyse, and capitalize on.

initial_reviews.review_title: Highly recommend RollWorks as an ABM tool; it doesn't take long to see the value!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
RollWorks is very easy to use and it didn't take too long to understand how to launch campaigns, update keywords, build ICPs. The interface is simpler than many other platforms I have used.

They continually add new features - last one they added was a Command Center, which makes it easy to see how your ads are performing. It is nice that they are continually trying to make it simpler and more effective to use.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
My only complaint would be the lack of flexibility when selecting filters. I have had issues where I wanted to select a variation of "and" as well as "or" for building out lists and was not able to make it as specific of a segment as I would have wanted.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
RollWorks is helping us segment our buyers by their stage in the journey. We can see which accounts are landing where in the funnel, and it has been helping us significantly to be able to segment out our content. We have an automated process as well for the types of ads showing, so it is nice to almost set it and forget it, knowing marketing is happening behind the scenes.

initial_reviews.review_title: Best Choice for ABM and CRM Integration
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
The integration with Hubspot is amazing. My sales team never has to login - they can see all the data in our CRM and with a quick toggle I can run ads targeting their target accounts seemlessly and in real time. The intent data overlays also allow us to expand our google keyword search to the rest of the internet and narrow down our target set to just those firms that are looking for products like ours.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I just wish the exclusion list was dynamic - every other feature in the system is.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Allows us to scale our marketing and sales team by being seemlessly integrated with the rest of our platforms. We can effectively use RollWorks as our BDM and then qualify leads that go to our sales team.

initial_reviews.review_title: Senior Lifecycle Marketing Manager
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Rollworks platform is extremely user-friendly and easy to learn from day one. We use the platform for digital ads and tracking funnel movement and it has been a major upgrade from previous systems. I use the platform daily for various functions and the ease of use really is such a game changer. Our implementation process was hands-on and collaborative, with a consistent team that understood our goals and objectives. We have had the same customer success manager since implementation (over a year ago) and he is outstanding. He continuously updates us on new product features that fit our goals, helps switch strategic planning, and is extremely quick to respond if we have any issues or questions. From a digital ads perspective, we see strong performance and the reporting capabilities provide a wide range of reporting breakdowns.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I wouldn't say I have any major dislikes, just product features that would be nice to have, and every single time we bring those to the team they reach out to their engineering and team counterparts to understand if our ask is on the product roadmap. More than once our request is on the map and in some cases we've been asked to help beta test.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Rollsworks has given us an advertising platform that is clear and easy to build ABM campaigns and retargeting motions. It connects our account data from Hubspot and pushes it to LinkedIn so we can continue our omnichannel ABM efforts with enriched and accurate data. Additionally, it has helped us build a standard for how we in Marketing and Sales look at our in TAM accounts and track where they are at in the marketing and sales motion. Finally, it has helped showcase our ideal customer profile and enriched our accounts with intent data.

initial_reviews.review_title: Transformational tool that's helped evolve our GTM strategy
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Rollworks was our first ABM focused tool that we decided to deploy and, for a large part, has been a huge asset for our GTM team.

From the easy implementation and setup, direct integrations that we needed (G2, Hubspot, Slack), and amazing customer success support, it's made it's impact on our marketing strategy and execution.

We use the awareness funnel in Rollworks to track movement of a very defined target market - allowing us to track our activities back to true account impact in a way that I have not had access to do anywhere previously.

We also leverage intent spikes with our sales team through a direct integration with Slack, allowing us to know where to spend time when prospecting.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
The reporting is coming along slowly with iterative updates - and there's still some room for improvement when it comes to tracking/reporting on awareness stage movement at an individual account level.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're using Rollworks to focus all efforts on our target market - and Rollworks helps us track the impact of our efforts so we know what to continue, what to tweak, and what to stop doing.

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: Director of Product and Growth Marketing

initial_reviews.review_title: A solve to your marketing and sales hurdles
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
RollWorks has allowed us to solve some of our biggest problems when it comes to the marketing and sales roads joining together. It has empowered us to deliver timely ads to our targeted accounts while building out a sales funnel that informs and prioritizes accounts. Being able to deliver marketing campaigns through RollWorks that allow marketing and sales to monitor accounts at key points in the buying journey has been the missing link to capitalizing on our budgets and getting to our highest priority accounts. Additionally, it continues to surface opportunities when accounts show a higher intent to buy, bringing them into the prioritization outreach cycle that we may have missed before onboarding RollWorks. We have seen increased collaboration and a deeper level of intent to harness in our outreach, and it has saved us time by filling the sales funnel with warmer accounts ready to talk to us. Lastly, the integrations with Hubspot and G2 have been key in making it all come to life in a single, easy-to-use view for sales, marketing, and leadership.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
There are no downsides other than the adoption of the Sales Insights in Hubspot from our sales team. The RollWorks team has been very helpful in making sure our team doesn't feel overwhelmed and knows how to use this data.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We didn't have an integrated way to surface accounts showing high intent to buy with the ability to target until we onboarded RollWorks. Prior to RollWorks, we used a platform that did not integrate with Hubspot and some of our other tools, and the data was not timely to act on and building out targeted account lists to push out ads was manual and painful. With RollWorks, our systems all talk to each other for near real-time insights and analytics that allow us to actively build out and act on those insights. They even have workflows that harness data to push back into Hubspot and automate email and other outreach opportunities. It makes it all seamless and visible to key members of the team - from marketing and sales to leadership.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Rollworks has been a great tool for a multitude of reasons: we use it to test out various messaging, warm up our audience, and gather intent data to help create a holistic picture.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I wish there was more visibility on the contact activity in accounts in Rollworks, but can get contact info generally for who is interacting with your site from which accounts. Plus, they just rolled out a feature called "hot contacts" which helps us identify which people from which accounts are showing high interest.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
It helps us understand what accounts are showing intent both in the topics we are about and our actual website as well. It also helps give us great cloud cover to warm up our audiences before we pass them over to sales.

initial_reviews.review_title: Rollworks ABM
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I like how easy it is to get up and running - the cusotmer support is good and their team is knowledgeable. They offer a number of features to get account spiking information, and target appropriately with advertising. I really like how they can deanonymize CRM contacts on site - and it integrates easily with Salesforce for our team.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
That you can't have two CRM connections.  We use multiple CRMs and MAPs at our org and it would be nice to have all the data in as many places as possible.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Rollworks gives us the ability to target named accounts with advertising.  We're using it outside the software industry and trying to gain a competitive advantage by implementing new strategies.  It gives us easier go-to-market opportunity than trying to build something similar manually.

initial_reviews.review_title: Okay-ish ABM tool
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Knowing where accounts are in their "journey stage" is helpful. Being able to target certain accounts for niche markets is useful. Bombora intent topic targeting is a nice option when the client doesn't provide a targeting list. It does offer several integrations (unfortunately our clients don't use these platforms currently).

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
The platform has a lot of holes in terms of functionality, like LinkedIn campaigns don't have the same capabilities as running in platform (they've had a 'roadmap' for updating these items for awhile but progress is slow). We've also been having issues with LinkedIn campaigns actually serving over the past few months- still no solid solution to this. There are weird nuances all over the place, like editing ads sometimes actually creates duplicate ads. Also, budget pacing is a real struggle. Sometimes even specifically-excluded accounts are still served ads.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
The platform can solve the problem of wasted impressions by targeting just the accounts / job titles that make the most sense. We can reach specific companies and positions within them, which is harder to achieve otherwise.

initial_reviews.review_title: Share Useful Marketing Data with Sales Teams
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Rollworks offers marketing professionals a simple way to share useful data with sales teams. I use Rollworks to determine when potential customers are engaging with my company's website, and to help the sales team focus their time and effort on engaged leads.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
As a paid media professional, I appreciate it when advertising platforms display key metrics in a way that's easy to read. Unfortunately within Rollworks, there isn't an easy way to view the Total Spend across all enabled campaigns. To determine how much I've spent so far in a given month, I click into each enabled campaign, write down the amount spent, and repeat this process until I have the total spend. This is a time-consuming process when a lot of campaigns are running.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Rollworks is useful when a company wants to advertise to a specific type of professional across multiple industries. Instead of passively waiting for leads to find your company, Rollworks helps marketing and sales professionals actively search for new opportunities.

initial_reviews.review_title: Good overall, with some room to improve
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
RollWorks easily integrates with HubSpot or Salesforce. I enjoy that it sends account level information to GA4, and that integration is also easy to setup. Customer support is responsive, so I'm not slowed down by their support while in the platform nearly every day.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Sometimes the platform can operate slowly, especially when pulling data with large timeframes. The built-in reports are limited to some extent, but you can generally get what you need from the platform.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
The problems RollWorks ABM is solving for us is providing a means to target accounts that would be interested in our product.

initial_reviews.review_title: A True Partnership for Success
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Rollworks is not only a great platform to strengthen our pipeline but also a remarkable team to work with. Their intent-based data and ease of paid media execution have greatly improved our pipeline activities. This activity with Rollworks elevates our existing expertise and data management to provide even more insights and better targeting to have our brand reach the right people at the right time, with data to back it up. From day one, their team has truly been partners for mutual success with both as an agency and our clients. Their team is packed with professionals who are extremely experienced, without sacrificing kindness, while remaining restfully helpful. This enablement makes it easier for us and our clients to implement, use, and integrate Rollworks into existing systems. Their industry-leading solution, paired with a remarkable team, makes it easy to recommend Rollworks to our clients and for continued internal use.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Some of the less-mature campaigns with Rollworks proved to be lackluster and didn't perform as we expected. But through excellent customer support and guidance on optimal usage, we were, together, able to get our new campaigns up and running and back on track.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Using RollWorks intent data has been critical to information and empowering our lead pipeline. This data has proven to be very helpful in identifying and elevating the "hottest" opportunities so our sales team can take insightful actions with those leads. This data also files a portion of our lead scoring system, which directly reports on intent-based data to elevate high-scoring, high-intent-based leads to our sales team for outreach. This is just a snippet of the valuable data we received from Rollworks and how we use that data to enrich our existing processes.

initial_reviews.review_title: Maximizing ABM success with RollWorks: An agency partner's experience
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
The user interface is intuitive, streamlining account management and saving us valuable time. The machine learning-backed targeted account identification is a standout feature, focusing our efforts on the most promising leads. The platform also integrates smoothly with popular CRMs, and their customer support is both responsive and knowledgeable.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
While the pricing model offers a range of robust features, it might be on the higher end for smaller clients who are budget-conscious. On the analytics side, RollWorks does provide valuable data, but there's potential for even more advanced reporting features to further refine campaign strategies. As for the initial setup, it is comprehensive but might require some time investment, particularly for custom integrations.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
RollWorks is addressing several critical challenges in account-based marketing that have brought considerable benefits to our agency.

Firstly, it's solving the problem of target identification. Traditional methods can be hit or miss, but RollWorks uses machine learning algorithms to precisely identify high-value accounts. This has made our campaigns more focused, reducing waste in ad spend and increasing ROI.

Secondly, it's enhancing our campaign efficiency. The platform's ease of use and seamless integration capabilities with popular CRMs mean we spend less time on administrative tasks and more on strategy and execution.

Lastly, the customer support ensures that any issues are swiftly resolved, minimizing downtime and keeping our campaigns running smoothly.

Overall, RollWorks is boosting our productivity, enhancing the effectiveness of our campaigns, and making it easier for us to deliver excellent results for our clients.

initial_reviews.review_title: RollWorks is a great tool
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
RollWorks has helped us expand our brand awareness and help influence several of our vertically focused target accounts. We have booked several meetings from our ABM strategy with RollWorks. We're expecting big things as we're ready to invest even more money into this program.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Unfortunately, there is no quick fix with ABM. RollWorks has a great team supporting us and it just takes time to run the tests and develope the campaigns. There are no shortcuts with ABM.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Prior to using RollWorks, we did not have an effective solution that could  target our top tier accounts, pull that data into HubSpot and help us make more informed decisions. Now, we can look at a multitude of reports that show us which ads are performing the best, what accounts are engaging with us and how those engagements are influencing open deals. We've only scratched the surface with what we can do with RollWorks and we look forward to expanding it in the near term.

The Salesforce integration and intel that Rollworks provides right inside the client record has been very helpful in keeping our marketing and sales partners aligned in our ABM strategy.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
The platform is expensive for smaller organizations. Our ABM account list is barely large enough to warrant the spend.

initial_reviews.review_title: Not just an advertising platform but a business intelligence platform too
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Rollworks constantly update its platform to keep improving it. Their upcoming "Hot Contacts" feature is precious as a way to create many soft leads for your business. The way we can slice and dice contact and account information into an advertising campaign is impressive.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
There are not many downsides to Rollworks. I'd like to see a deeper integration to LinkedIn ads through being able to use LinkedIn Lead Generation Ads (ads with a form) through the Rollworks platform as that is our main ad format when we use LinkedIn.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Rollworks solves the "how can we have a good account based marketing platform" problem that a company like Google isn't great at solving. Sure Google has display advertising and whatnot, but Rollworks blows them out of the water when it comes to using internal data to get the right customer segments the right message at the right time.

all_reviews.review_title: Account Based B2B Solution for Personalized Sales
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
The use of targeted online advertising, the ability to do retargeting campaigns and support for online social media channel advertising is really a welcome aspect of how RollWorks can help the small sales team do big things.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
The features of Rollworks are overall very good. Reporting could be improved to be a little more comprehensive and the UI could be improved by making reporting results sortable upon viewing in the UI so as not to export and sort things, this would be a convenience, but the data that is provided is very good overall.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Retargeting ability in RollWorks is really very good. The marketing intelligence that we receive based on our marketing efforts and website analytics helps us target our advertising with laser like focus.  The Bombora database used by Rollworks is really very comprehensive and that makes a big difference in our ability to identify qualified leads quickly. The fact that RollWorks integrates with Salesforce for us makes it a solutions that we can combine our marketing team with our sales team to work effectively with data we were not able to get as effeciently before.

all_reviews.review_title: A Refreshing ABM Experience
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
One of the best aspects of RollWorks is the integration with HubSpot. As an end-to-end HubSpot user, we're able to pull in signals into our HubSpot dashboards, powering both sales and marketing to be on the same page on who we're targeting and when. From a marketers perspective, Rollworks makes it pretty easy to build playbooks and audiences to target.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I wish we could upload our own HTML5 ads. I understand why we can't but sometimes that adds a few days to the timeline, waiting for those to be populated.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
The biggest issue RollWorks solved for me was that it tells us where to fish and when to fish there. We have a small but mighty team, but if we're going to invest time in outbound and advertising, we might as well make sure they are in-market for an employee advocacy platform. Also, I came from another ABM solution in which the integration with HubSpot was not a true two-way integration. Now it is, and it makes pulling data into HubSpot so much easier for us to review, analyse, and capitalize on.

review_question_answers.answer: The biggest issue RollWorks solved for me was that it tells us where to fish and when to fish there. We have a small but mighty team, but if we're going to invest time in outbound and advertising, we might as well make sure they are in-market for an employee advocacy platform. Also, I came from another ABM solution in which the integration with HubSpot was not a true two-way integration. Now it is, and it makes pulling data into HubSpot so much easier for us to review, analyse, and capitalize on.

all_reviews.review_title: Highly recommend RollWorks as an ABM tool; it doesn't take long to see the value!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
RollWorks is very easy to use and it didn't take too long to understand how to launch campaigns, update keywords, build ICPs. The interface is simpler than many other platforms I have used.

They continually add new features - last one they added was a Command Center, which makes it easy to see how your ads are performing. It is nice that they are continually trying to make it simpler and more effective to use.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
My only complaint would be the lack of flexibility when selecting filters. I have had issues where I wanted to select a variation of "and" as well as "or" for building out lists and was not able to make it as specific of a segment as I would have wanted.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
RollWorks is helping us segment our buyers by their stage in the journey. We can see which accounts are landing where in the funnel, and it has been helping us significantly to be able to segment out our content. We have an automated process as well for the types of ads showing, so it is nice to almost set it and forget it, knowing marketing is happening behind the scenes.

all_reviews.review_title: Best Choice for ABM and CRM Integration
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
The integration with Hubspot is amazing. My sales team never has to login - they can see all the data in our CRM and with a quick toggle I can run ads targeting their target accounts seemlessly and in real time. The intent data overlays also allow us to expand our google keyword search to the rest of the internet and narrow down our target set to just those firms that are looking for products like ours.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I just wish the exclusion list was dynamic - every other feature in the system is.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Allows us to scale our marketing and sales team by being seemlessly integrated with the rest of our platforms. We can effectively use RollWorks as our BDM and then qualify leads that go to our sales team.

all_reviews.review_title: Senior Lifecycle Marketing Manager
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Rollworks platform is extremely user-friendly and easy to learn from day one. We use the platform for digital ads and tracking funnel movement and it has been a major upgrade from previous systems. I use the platform daily for various functions and the ease of use really is such a game changer. Our implementation process was hands-on and collaborative, with a consistent team that understood our goals and objectives. We have had the same customer success manager since implementation (over a year ago) and he is outstanding. He continuously updates us on new product features that fit our goals, helps switch strategic planning, and is extremely quick to respond if we have any issues or questions. From a digital ads perspective, we see strong performance and the reporting capabilities provide a wide range of reporting breakdowns.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I wouldn't say I have any major dislikes, just product features that would be nice to have, and every single time we bring those to the team they reach out to their engineering and team counterparts to understand if our ask is on the product roadmap. More than once our request is on the map and in some cases we've been asked to help beta test.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Rollsworks has given us an advertising platform that is clear and easy to build ABM campaigns and retargeting motions. It connects our account data from Hubspot and pushes it to LinkedIn so we can continue our omnichannel ABM efforts with enriched and accurate data. Additionally, it has helped us build a standard for how we in Marketing and Sales look at our in TAM accounts and track where they are at in the marketing and sales motion. Finally, it has helped showcase our ideal customer profile and enriched our accounts with intent data.

all_reviews.review_title: Transformational tool that's helped evolve our GTM strategy
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Rollworks was our first ABM focused tool that we decided to deploy and, for a large part, has been a huge asset for our GTM team.

From the easy implementation and setup, direct integrations that we needed (G2, Hubspot, Slack), and amazing customer success support, it's made it's impact on our marketing strategy and execution.

We use the awareness funnel in Rollworks to track movement of a very defined target market - allowing us to track our activities back to true account impact in a way that I have not had access to do anywhere previously.

We also leverage intent spikes with our sales team through a direct integration with Slack, allowing us to know where to spend time when prospecting.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
The reporting is coming along slowly with iterative updates - and there's still some room for improvement when it comes to tracking/reporting on awareness stage movement at an individual account level.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're using Rollworks to focus all efforts on our target market - and Rollworks helps us track the impact of our efforts so we know what to continue, what to tweak, and what to stop doing.

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: Director of Product and Growth Marketing

all_reviews.review_title: A solve to your marketing and sales hurdles
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
RollWorks has allowed us to solve some of our biggest problems when it comes to the marketing and sales roads joining together. It has empowered us to deliver timely ads to our targeted accounts while building out a sales funnel that informs and prioritizes accounts. Being able to deliver marketing campaigns through RollWorks that allow marketing and sales to monitor accounts at key points in the buying journey has been the missing link to capitalizing on our budgets and getting to our highest priority accounts. Additionally, it continues to surface opportunities when accounts show a higher intent to buy, bringing them into the prioritization outreach cycle that we may have missed before onboarding RollWorks. We have seen increased collaboration and a deeper level of intent to harness in our outreach, and it has saved us time by filling the sales funnel with warmer accounts ready to talk to us. Lastly, the integrations with Hubspot and G2 have been key in making it all come to life in a single, easy-to-use view for sales, marketing, and leadership.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
There are no downsides other than the adoption of the Sales Insights in Hubspot from our sales team. The RollWorks team has been very helpful in making sure our team doesn't feel overwhelmed and knows how to use this data.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We didn't have an integrated way to surface accounts showing high intent to buy with the ability to target until we onboarded RollWorks. Prior to RollWorks, we used a platform that did not integrate with Hubspot and some of our other tools, and the data was not timely to act on and building out targeted account lists to push out ads was manual and painful. With RollWorks, our systems all talk to each other for near real-time insights and analytics that allow us to actively build out and act on those insights. They even have workflows that harness data to push back into Hubspot and automate email and other outreach opportunities. It makes it all seamless and visible to key members of the team - from marketing and sales to leadership.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Rollworks has been a great tool for a multitude of reasons: we use it to test out various messaging, warm up our audience, and gather intent data to help create a holistic picture.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I wish there was more visibility on the contact activity in accounts in Rollworks, but can get contact info generally for who is interacting with your site from which accounts. Plus, they just rolled out a feature called "hot contacts" which helps us identify which people from which accounts are showing high interest.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
It helps us understand what accounts are showing intent both in the topics we are about and our actual website as well. It also helps give us great cloud cover to warm up our audiences before we pass them over to sales.

all_reviews.review_title: Rollworks ABM
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I like how easy it is to get up and running - the cusotmer support is good and their team is knowledgeable. They offer a number of features to get account spiking information, and target appropriately with advertising. I really like how they can deanonymize CRM contacts on site - and it integrates easily with Salesforce for our team.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
That you can't have two CRM connections.  We use multiple CRMs and MAPs at our org and it would be nice to have all the data in as many places as possible.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Rollworks gives us the ability to target named accounts with advertising.  We're using it outside the software industry and trying to gain a competitive advantage by implementing new strategies.  It gives us easier go-to-market opportunity than trying to build something similar manually.

The number of integrations (something I know they are working on) woul dbe improved and the data visualization.

all_reviews.review_title: Okay-ish ABM tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Knowing where accounts are in their "journey stage" is helpful. Being able to target certain accounts for niche markets is useful. Bombora intent topic targeting is a nice option when the client doesn't provide a targeting list. It does offer several integrations (unfortunately our clients don't use these platforms currently).

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
The platform has a lot of holes in terms of functionality, like LinkedIn campaigns don't have the same capabilities as running in platform (they've had a 'roadmap' for updating these items for awhile but progress is slow). We've also been having issues with LinkedIn campaigns actually serving over the past few months- still no solid solution to this. There are weird nuances all over the place, like editing ads sometimes actually creates duplicate ads. Also, budget pacing is a real struggle. Sometimes even specifically-excluded accounts are still served ads.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
The platform can solve the problem of wasted impressions by targeting just the accounts / job titles that make the most sense. We can reach specific companies and positions within them, which is harder to achieve otherwise.

all_reviews.review_title: Share Useful Marketing Data with Sales Teams
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Rollworks offers marketing professionals a simple way to share useful data with sales teams. I use Rollworks to determine when potential customers are engaging with my company's website, and to help the sales team focus their time and effort on engaged leads.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
As a paid media professional, I appreciate it when advertising platforms display key metrics in a way that's easy to read. Unfortunately within Rollworks, there isn't an easy way to view the Total Spend across all enabled campaigns. To determine how much I've spent so far in a given month, I click into each enabled campaign, write down the amount spent, and repeat this process until I have the total spend. This is a time-consuming process when a lot of campaigns are running.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Rollworks is useful when a company wants to advertise to a specific type of professional across multiple industries. Instead of passively waiting for leads to find your company, Rollworks helps marketing and sales professionals actively search for new opportunities.

all_reviews.review_title: A True Partnership for Success
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Rollworks is not only a great platform to strengthen our pipeline but also a remarkable team to work with. Their intent-based data and ease of paid media execution have greatly improved our pipeline activities. This activity with Rollworks elevates our existing expertise and data management to provide even more insights and better targeting to have our brand reach the right people at the right time, with data to back it up. From day one, their team has truly been partners for mutual success with both as an agency and our clients. Their team is packed with professionals who are extremely experienced, without sacrificing kindness, while remaining restfully helpful. This enablement makes it easier for us and our clients to implement, use, and integrate Rollworks into existing systems. Their industry-leading solution, paired with a remarkable team, makes it easy to recommend Rollworks to our clients and for continued internal use.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Some of the less-mature campaigns with Rollworks proved to be lackluster and didn't perform as we expected. But through excellent customer support and guidance on optimal usage, we were, together, able to get our new campaigns up and running and back on track.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Using RollWorks intent data has been critical to information and empowering our lead pipeline. This data has proven to be very helpful in identifying and elevating the "hottest" opportunities so our sales team can take insightful actions with those leads. This data also files a portion of our lead scoring system, which directly reports on intent-based data to elevate high-scoring, high-intent-based leads to our sales team for outreach. This is just a snippet of the valuable data we received from Rollworks and how we use that data to enrich our existing processes.

all_reviews.review_title: Maximizing ABM success with RollWorks: An agency partner's experience
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
The user interface is intuitive, streamlining account management and saving us valuable time. The machine learning-backed targeted account identification is a standout feature, focusing our efforts on the most promising leads. The platform also integrates smoothly with popular CRMs, and their customer support is both responsive and knowledgeable.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
While the pricing model offers a range of robust features, it might be on the higher end for smaller clients who are budget-conscious. On the analytics side, RollWorks does provide valuable data, but there's potential for even more advanced reporting features to further refine campaign strategies. As for the initial setup, it is comprehensive but might require some time investment, particularly for custom integrations.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
RollWorks is addressing several critical challenges in account-based marketing that have brought considerable benefits to our agency.

Firstly, it's solving the problem of target identification. Traditional methods can be hit or miss, but RollWorks uses machine learning algorithms to precisely identify high-value accounts. This has made our campaigns more focused, reducing waste in ad spend and increasing ROI.

Secondly, it's enhancing our campaign efficiency. The platform's ease of use and seamless integration capabilities with popular CRMs mean we spend less time on administrative tasks and more on strategy and execution.

Lastly, the customer support ensures that any issues are swiftly resolved, minimizing downtime and keeping our campaigns running smoothly.

Overall, RollWorks is boosting our productivity, enhancing the effectiveness of our campaigns, and making it easier for us to deliver excellent results for our clients.

all_reviews.review_title: RollWorks is a great tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
RollWorks has helped us expand our brand awareness and help influence several of our vertically focused target accounts. We have booked several meetings from our ABM strategy with RollWorks. We're expecting big things as we're ready to invest even more money into this program.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Unfortunately, there is no quick fix with ABM. RollWorks has a great team supporting us and it just takes time to run the tests and develope the campaigns. There are no shortcuts with ABM.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Prior to using RollWorks, we did not have an effective solution that could  target our top tier accounts, pull that data into HubSpot and help us make more informed decisions. Now, we can look at a multitude of reports that show us which ads are performing the best, what accounts are engaging with us and how those engagements are influencing open deals. We've only scratched the surface with what we can do with RollWorks and we look forward to expanding it in the near term.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Rollworks constantly update its platform to keep improving it. Their upcoming "Hot Contacts" feature is precious as a way to create many soft leads for your business. The way we can slice and dice contact and account information into an advertising campaign is impressive.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
There are not many downsides to Rollworks. I'd like to see a deeper integration to LinkedIn ads through being able to use LinkedIn Lead Generation Ads (ads with a form) through the Rollworks platform as that is our main ad format when we use LinkedIn.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Rollworks solves the "how can we have a good account based marketing platform" problem that a company like Google isn't great at solving. Sure Google has display advertising and whatnot, but Rollworks blows them out of the water when it comes to using internal data to get the right customer segments the right message at the right time.

all_reviews.review_content:

RollWorks is a first-rate Account-Based Marketing (ABM) tool that has greatly enhanced our marketing operations. Their platform provides a wide range of tools and capabilities that enable us to target and interact with particular accounts successfully. Our improved conversion rates and ROI may be attributed to our thorough account segmentation and personalized content delivery. Additionally, the thorough analytics and reporting tools have made it possible for us to monitor the success of our efforts and come to informed judgments. The customer service staff at RollWorks has been incredibly helpful and prompt, which has improved our use of their platform. Overall, RollWorks has played a key role in strengthening our ABM strategy, and we heartily endorse their services for companies looking to launch effective and well-targeted marketing campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: Proven, Complete Platform for Account Based Marketing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
We have been able to realize several connections between our funnel and the influence of Rollworks. There are several wins that would not have been possible without this platform. The account management team stays on top of everything for us. We provide updated creative and ideas on what we want to do and they work together to ensure that it is all taken care of. I really appreciate their hands-on approach to serving their customers' needs.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
While we ad to perform quite a bit of the setup during onboarding and right after, the team has pulled through and been available for us as needed to ensure that everything is in place to target the right accounts and maximize the Rollworks platform.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
RollWorks is allowing us to reach users on platforms and in ways that we could not this easily with any other platform. We're able to see who is truly interested in our product and are better poised to use the engagement data to better our outreach and ultimately our close rates. We have been able to attribute a number of closed deals to the influence of the Rollworks campaign. The retargeting data that has been provided is helpful for us to make changes to our marketing materials (i.e. website) and to our ad copy in a way that has allowed us to continue to grow because of the analytics within the Rollworks platform.

The integrations with other platforms make Rollworks even more powerful. Being able to combine tools from our marketing stack enables us to amplify our marketing strategy while relaxing the effort on our part. That is a huge win for us being a smaller marketing team.

all_reviews.review_title: Overall positive experience with rollworks - great abm platform with helpful targeting and reporting
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Going to go with two bests - the reporting and the targeting.

The reporting on the ads/audiences/etc is helpful, but what makes rollworks unique is the additional reporting features. I find journey stages particularly interesting (esp being able to customize - we have customized according to progression down the sales funnel in salesforce) as well as being able to view the website activity for companies and the hot contacts/accounts. It's neat that you can see these metrics for "influenced by rollworks advertising" and overall/not neccessarily influenced by RW.

The targeting is also helpful in that you can be broad or hyper targeted/granular. Targeting based on intent (based on keywords you set) allows you to get your ads in front of the right people.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
No major downsides! Not entirely sure about the playbook vs campaign distinction (but that could just be a gap in my personal understanding). Also, we treat rollworks as a combo of awareness and lead gen, but always do want to drive more leads more efficiently. So RW has a higher cost per lead than some other platforms we use, but we do know that's mainly b/c we're using it in part as a display/awareness play vs pure lead gen (so this isn't entirely a downside, just a comment!) and b/c the platform is meant to be (from my understanding) a little higher funnel.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
RW is helping us with brand awareness and lead gen. We are mainly focused on data security (using kw intent and target accounts) as well as website retargeting.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
review_question_answers.answer:
Going to go with two bests - the reporting and the targeting.

The reporting on the ads/audiences/etc is helpful, but what makes rollworks unique is the additional reporting features. I find journey stages particularly interesting (esp being able to customize - we have customized according to progression down the sales funnel in salesforce) as well as being able to view the website activity for companies and the hot contacts/accounts. It's neat that you can see these metrics for "influenced by rollworks advertising" and overall/not neccessarily influenced by RW.

The targeting is also helpful in that you can be broad or hyper targeted/granular. Targeting based on intent (based on keywords you set) allows you to get your ads in front of the right people.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
review_question_answers.answer: No major downsides! Not entirely sure about the playbook vs campaign distinction (but that could just be a gap in my personal understanding). Also, we treat rollworks as a combo of awareness and lead gen, but always do want to drive more leads more efficiently. So RW has a higher cost per lead than some other platforms we use, but we do know that's mainly b/c we're using it in part as a display/awareness play vs pure lead gen (so this isn't entirely a downside, just a comment!) and b/c the platform is meant to be (from my understanding) a little higher funnel.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: RW is helping us with brand awareness and lead gen. We are mainly focused on data security (using kw intent and target accounts) as well as website retargeting.

all_reviews.review_title: RollWorks has helped our business greatly improve our B2B lead generation efforts.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
One of RollWorks' most valuable features is its ability to target high-value accounts, which allows our business to focus our resources on the most promising prospects and improve our overall return on investment; by identifying and engaging with key decision-makers, we can more effectively build relationships and close deals that drive revenue growth over the long term.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
One weakness of RollWorks' platform is that some users may find it to be somewhat complex or overwhelming, particularly if they lack experience with account-based marketing or similar tools; while the platform does offer a lot of powerful features and customization options, it can take some time to fully master and leverage all of these capabilities effectively.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
RollWorks has been instrumental in helping our business execute a highly effective account-based marketing strategy, by providing us with powerful targeting and engagement tools that enable us to identify and engage with high-value prospects at key accounts in a more personalized and effective way, resulting in increased conversion rates and revenue growth.

all_reviews.review_title: Rollworks has been a great introduction into display advertising for our firm.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I like the ability to segment account lists by team due to our team's unique structure. The representatives we work with are very helpful and the platform us user friendly. We also like that we can pull in Salesforce data, use intent topics to create lists, or build lists with account criteria that Rollworks provides. This allows us to reach our desired audience in a variety of ways.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Inability to target by granular location (city, state, etc). This is important to our team because we have "footholds" or geos that are more important than others that we want to focus on.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have been seeing a lot of success with the retargeting campaigns since we have heavy traffic to our site via organic and paid search. This allows us to move audience members further down the funnel with more gated content. This is helping us reach aware potential leads. We also are new to running display ads and our presence online is important.

all_reviews.review_title: A Game-Changer for Account-Based Marketing: RollWorks Account-Based Platform Review
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I recently had the opportunity to explore RollWorks Account-Based Platform, and I must say it has truly revolutionized the way I approach account-based marketing (ABM). As a marketer striving to drive targeted engagement and personalized experiences for my target accounts, I have found RollWorks to be an invaluable tool in achieving my goals. Here's what I like best about this exceptional platform:

Comprehensive Account-Based Capabilities:
RollWorks offers a comprehensive suite of features specifically tailored for account-based marketing. From identifying and targeting key accounts to executing multi-channel campaigns, the platform covers the entire ABM workflow. It allows me to easily segment and prioritize accounts, create personalized campaigns, and measure their effectiveness, all within a single interface.

Precise Account Identification:
RollWorks excels in its ability to identify and prioritize high-value accounts accurately. The platform leverages powerful data analytics and machine learning algorithms to provide actionable insights about potential customers. The account identification process is highly sophisticated, taking into account firmographics, technographics, intent data, and historical engagement to ensure I'm targeting the right accounts with the highest propensity to convert.

Multichannel Orchestration:
One of the standout features of RollWorks is its seamless integration of various marketing channels. The platform enables me to deliver a consistent and personalized experience across multiple touchpoints, including display advertising, email marketing, social media, and more. The ability to orchestrate campaigns across channels not only increases the reach but also enhances engagement and conversion rates by ensuring a cohesive brand presence.

Advanced Personalization:
RollWorks empowers me to create highly personalized campaigns that resonate with target accounts on an individual level. The platform offers powerful segmentation and dynamic content capabilities, allowing me to tailor messages, visuals, and CTAs based on account attributes, intent signals, and historical behavior. This level of personalization enables me to establish meaningful connections, build trust, and drive better results.

Robust Measurement and Reporting:
With RollWorks, tracking and measuring the effectiveness of ABM campaigns has become a breeze. The platform provides in-depth analytics and reporting features that offer valuable insights into campaign performance, account engagement, and overall ROI. The ability to attribute revenue to specific marketing efforts enables me to optimize campaigns, make data-driven decisions, and continuously improve my ABM strategy.

Exceptional Customer Support:
RollWorks goes above and beyond when it comes to customer support. Their team is knowledgeable, responsive, and genuinely invested in helping users succeed. From initial onboarding to ongoing support, they are there every step of the way, providing guidance, best practices, and troubleshooting assistance. This level of support ensures that I can leverage the full potential of the platform and achieve my ABM objectives effectively.

In conclusion, RollWorks Account-Based Platform is a game-changer for anyone seeking to implement successful account-based marketing strategies. Its comprehensive capabilities, accurate account identification, multichannel orchestration, advanced personalization, robust measurement tools, and outstanding customer support make it a top choice for marketers looking to drive targeted engagement and achieve measurable results. I highly recommend RollWorks to any organization looking to take their ABM efforts to new heights.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Learning Curve: RollWorks Account-Based Platform is a powerful tool with advanced capabilities, which can result in a slightly steep learning curve for new users. While the platform provides documentation and resources to support onboarding, some individuals may require additional time and effort to fully grasp and utilize all the features effectively.

Complexity for Small-Scale Operations: The robustness of RollWorks can be a double-edged sword for smaller-scale operations. While the platform is ideal for enterprises and larger organizations with significant resources, it may seem overwhelming or unnecessary for smaller businesses with limited budgets and simpler ABM requirements. Simplifying the user interface or offering scaled-down versions tailored to smaller businesses could address this concern.

Integration Challenges: While RollWorks offers integrations with various marketing automation and CRM platforms, some users may encounter challenges when integrating the platform with their existing tech stack. Depending on the specific systems and configurations, the integration process might require technical expertise or additional support from RollWorks' team to ensure smooth data flow and synchronization.

Pricing Structure: The pricing structure for RollWorks Account-Based Platform may be considered a drawback by some users. The platform operates on a subscription-based model, and the costs can be relatively higher compared to other ABM solutions in the market. This pricing structure may restrict access for smaller businesses or those with limited marketing budgets, potentially limiting their ability to leverage the platform's full potential.

Limited Native Advertising Options: While RollWorks provides robust multichannel capabilities, some users might find the native advertising options within the platform to be limited. Expanding the range of native advertising channels and ad formats would enhance the platform's versatility and enable users to leverage additional channels for their ABM campaigns.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
RollWorks Account-Based Platform solves several critical problems in the realm of account-based marketing (ABM), which ultimately benefit me as a marketer. Firstly, it addresses the challenge of accurately identifying and targeting high-value accounts, leveraging sophisticated data analytics and machine learning algorithms. This ensures that my efforts are focused on the accounts most likely to convert, saving time and resources. Secondly, RollWorks enables me to create personalized campaigns at scale, providing a solution to the problem of delivering tailored experiences to a large number of accounts. The platform's multichannel orchestration capabilities ensure consistent messaging and enhance engagement. Lastly, RollWorks offers robust measurement and reporting tools, allowing me to track performance, optimize campaigns, and make data-driven decisions, leading to improved ROI and overall ABM effectiveness.

all_reviews.review_title: Great way to start with retargeting ads.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
RollWorks makes it very easy to create a retargeting campaign.  When we first launched our product, we knew that we wanted to advertise but we were not sure where.  We thought that it would be best to retarget those who came to the website and had shown interest.  So, we did.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
What I do not like about RollWorks is the same thing I do not like about most every other ad platform.  Since it isn't the fault of RollWorks, and it's just a matter of how the data must appear, there isn't anything negative about them personally.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
It's helping us better manage our retargeting efforts so that we are showing ads to those who have expressed interest in our product.  We use a few other platforms now in addition to RollWorks but we continue to use it for the value that it provides and since it is on other ad networks.

all_reviews.review_title: Decent Tactical Platform that Continues to Get the Job Done Year after Year
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Intuitive UI. Easy to allocate access to team.  Our experience with customer support has been favorable. The brand overall seems to have grown in esteem over the past couple of years. Strong growth at this company suggest sthat they are taking good hold in the market. Update: Integrations with Social have improved although additional 3P data would be helpful.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Integration with third party data could be better. We find ourselves having to take raw data into the platform more often than we would like. Easier access to alternative data would be welcome.  HubSpot and Salesforce integrations appear to have made great strides in integration caliber for this solution.  Updates: Precicion with URL-based targeting for ABM has improved mightily over the past few months.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Retargeting and ABM activation tend to be our foremost applications of the tool. Again, it would be helpful to have better integrations into a third party ecosystem of vendors. Update: Hubspot and SFDC CRM integrations have improved this quite a lot. Update: Although progress has been made we would benefit from more 3P data sources being available in the integrations roster.

all_reviews.review_title: Great Platform for Brand Awareness in Targeted Markets and Accounts with Strong Orchestration
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
- We chose to focus our ABM on hyper targeted advertising, and RW was the best for that.  Working to become NOT the best kept secret in subscription billing, we are acutely attuned to driving awareness in key accounts, then following up with them in a hyper targeted way.  RW is ideal for this.
- Cost wise, RW serves our needs much better than the alternatives give our business case

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Nothing yet. Smooth implementation, great customer support, and a pretty intuitive system.  Some of the reporting requires a bit more of a deep dive to build into our overall dashboards, but our SFDC admin is working to get this consolidated.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are focused on enterprise sales, and Rollworks allos us to ensure that we are targeting specific accounts rather than the 'world.'  We have replaced our other Intent data platforms with RW and are finding it incredibly helpful.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I am able to target intent companies and know where my ad spend is going. The platform provides visibility where you won't get with other tools.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
The integration with Salesforce was not a great experience for my team. It took longer than expected and not as smooth.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Precise targeting is the problem RollWorks solved for me and reading the intent signals is beneficial for sales and marketing.

all_reviews.review_title: Lots of promises, little delivery
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
The ads creator is pretty easy to use. It would be better if UTMs were easier to add and modify, but generally, the ads are easy to upload and edit.

I believe the new workflow capabilities have the potential to be useful in marketing automation. John Anzelc has been very helpful and insightful.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I have been consistently disappointed with RollWorks.

I started working inside RollWorks in August 2022. At my first meeting, I was excited about the opportunities within the platform and the targeting options, but by September 2022, I was disappointed and shifting my budget off the platform.

Immediately my RollWorks rep promised me things on the phone without following through. I would ask for examples of reporting or audience targeting and even after following up myself, I wouldn't get any of the materials. Every call felt like Groundhogs Day, where I was asking for the same things over and over again.

In October, I noticed some discrepancies in targeting and opened a support ticket and informed my RollWorks rep. My rep said he would take care of it, but a month later, with no resolution, he told me to open the ticket with support again. Reluctantly, I did, and now, in February 2023, the ticket is still unresolved, with a back-and-forth email exchange with support every week or two.

I have wanted to validate my campaigns with a confirmed visit from one person that fits my ideal customer profile, but I have not been able to accomplish that in the past 6-months.

I have ended up only using RollWorks as a way to run LinkedIn ads, but I would save your budget and run ads directly through LinkedIn to your account list.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
I have a niche audience that I am trying to build brand awareness and get more success from sales outreach to our ideal customers.  To accomplish this, I have uploaded our account list and tried to use RollWorks' persona targeting to narrow it down to decision-makers. So far, LinkedIn job title targeting has been more successful.

review_question_answers.answer:
The ads creator is pretty easy to use. It would be better if UTMs were easier to add and modify, but generally, the ads are easy to upload and edit.

I believe the new workflow capabilities have the potential to be useful in marketing automation. John Anzelc has been very helpful and insightful.

all_reviews.review_content:

RollWorks leverages it's integrations well to allow for account-based targeting in their playbooks. We leverage the SFDC integration for filtering accounts to target.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
It can be a little difficult to navigate the tool at times. It often takes me multiple tries to find the campaign I want to find.

RollWorks helps us provide air coverage to our TAL. Our Sales Teams loves that we're staying in front of these accounts.

all_reviews.review_title: Ad-Placements with B2B-specific features
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
It is quick and easy to upload ads and activate campaigns. Highlighting new audiences, tracking companies through the funnel, and tracking form-fills are also great features that are easy enough to access. There are some other specific features that sounded great but unfortunately we have not been able to utilize yet.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
It is difficult to track leads through the funnel; they are listed without identifying information or lost once converted. A general report would be excellent: individual reports that highlight specific functions. However, a simple PDF report highlighting the highest/lowest performing assets, top companies, etc., would be a great asset to share internally.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
In the B2B marketing space, display ads are a valuable tool, but the generic targeting of most DSPs means that the leads that come in are often useless. With RollWorks, company-level targeting means that I can ensure we hit the right base.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
review_question_answers.answer: It is quick and easy to upload ads and activate campaigns. Highlighting new audiences, tracking companies through the funnel, and tracking form-fills are also great features that are easy enough to access. There are some other specific features that sounded great but unfortunately we have not been able to utilize yet.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
review_question_answers.answer: It is difficult to track leads through the funnel; they are listed without identifying information or lost once converted. A general report would be excellent: individual reports that highlight specific functions. However, a simple PDF report highlighting the highest/lowest performing assets, top companies, etc., would be a great asset to share internally.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: In the B2B marketing space, display ads are a valuable tool, but the generic targeting of most DSPs means that the leads that come in are often useless. With RollWorks, company-level targeting means that I can ensure we hit the right base.

all_reviews.review_title: Valuable ABM Platform for B2B Businesses
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
It's intuitive and easy to use and the team at Rollworks is fantastic in helping you get onboarded and prepare your campaigns for success.

We have a lot of legacy tech at our organization and were not able to get insights into our ABM efforts. Using Rollworks gives us the engagement insights, intent, and journey of our target accounts and allows us to quickly launch media campaigns to start getting in front of these target accounts.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Currently nothing. I vetted all the major ABM platform contenders and Rollworks provided the best value for a company starting to focus on its ABM efforts.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Prior to Rollworks we didn't have insight into account engagement unless someone from the account completed a form or engaged with an email. Rollworks allows us to see what pages they are engaging with, what ads they are clicking on, and topis they are showing intent on, which allows us to properly score an account.
