I love their customer success and support team! They are always willing to go the extra mile to ensure your success. I love the reporting capabilities of the platform. The ability to really dig deep into the micro-interactions from accounts and contacts across your targeted accounts list.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I believe that Rollworks has room to improve with its integration with LinkedIn and the different advertising options available to be served through LinkedIn. It would also be fantastic if they could also add the ability to retarget on LinkedIn as well as display ads.

Recommendations to others considering RollWorks Account-Based Platform:
Rollworks are the best ABM platform out there! The support they provide to ensure successful ABM campaigns is superior in every way. I fully recommend using Rollworks over other platforms.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are solving the problem of not running ads that are reaching the right people in our ICP. The majority of our leads coming in would fall out of our ICP and Rollworks helps us target the exact people that we know would be great customers.

all_reviews.review_content:

price and inclusion of $1k ad spend per month

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Reporting is weird. In today's day and age, it's odd to have to wait for a pushed email for ad performance--that there isn't a real-time view available on the dashboard is a bummer.  I also don't like the limits on playbooks. And I wish the platform integrated with Salesforce better for an aggregate scoring model so we could attribute ad clicks at companies to account scores for account targets. Right now that info is in a silo.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Looking to get visibility among key decision-makers (HR folks) at targeted companies that are difficult to connect with via email or events.

all_reviews.review_title: Great Platform to Begin Your ABM Journey
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
The platform is pretty simple to use and offers detailed analytics. I like that you can upload all your ad creative in one spot and then pull it into any playbook where it's relevant. Setting up your journey stages is also quick and easy. Those give you a quick overview of how your target accounts are progressing through your funnel with great flexibility on what criteria you can add to define each stage. It's super useful that you can also see intent data. The account grading they perform also helps with prioritizing accounts to narrow your audience and spend more efficiently on ads.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Unfortunately, they don't yet have their 3rd party intent data available to share through their sales insights integration in Salesforce. It'd be a valuable data point for our SDR and sales team to leverage when viewing their accounts.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're looking to build awareness and drive engagement with specific accounts that closely match our ICP. Our goal is to drive more enterprise pipeline and revenue. Within 2 months of launching, we're already starting to see pipeline come  from these efforts.

all_reviews.review_title: Overall Good Product but Not Best Fit For All Industries
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
The level of customer support we received was great, and having a Bombora license feed directly into the platform was very convenient and helped us develop a strong target account list for ABM. Their reporting suite has also gotten much stronger over the last year or two, with helpful insights and visualizations.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
If your product is in a niche industry, it can be really hard to reach the right audience with Rollworks targeting. We also found the customization in terms of marketing touches from the account targeting playbooks to be lacking compared to other orchestration tools.

Recommendations to others considering RollWorks Account-Based Platform:
Rollworks from a cost perspective is a very competitive tool, but make sure to clarify that they can reach your target audience. We found the retargeting tool a great asset to our tech stack but are struggling to see success in our Account Based Playbooks.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are using Rollworks ABM platform for retargeting, account targeting and funnel progression. We have found the strongest benefit has been through their account-specific metrics which allow us to see our highly engaged accounts and pass this information along to the sales development team for prospecting.

It's easy to use and relatively easy to set up.  You should be warned that there is a fair bit of internal work to do on your web presence to make sure that it works accordingly.

It's hard to dial in the audience that you want to target.  To be fair to roll works, they have the tools to do this, it just takes a lot of time as a customer to consistently validate that the targets are correct.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Rollworks is a great platform to use to kickstart your ABM strategy. We've been using it to serve up tailored ads to various audiences (1:many and 1:few) and track engagement to help surface accounts for our BDR team. The platform itself is easy to use and our CSM has been super helpful, providing us with various tips and tricks to help us get the most out of our ABM strategy.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
We've had some issues with our sync between Rollworks and SFDC that led to some challenges surfacing accounts for our sales reps but overall the platform is pretty dependable.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Rollworks is helping us layer on another channel to our ABM efforts (display), plus it helps provide us with insights into how various target accounts are engaging, when they have buying intent, and surfacing those insights for our sales team.

all_reviews.review_title: Digital Marketing Manager
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Rollworks ability to show under the hood of where your ads being placed and how you can micro-target these segments based on higher level signals of intent is golden for a marketing team and campaign managers.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I do wish that, in general, ABM tools would be able to help close the gap between contact <> company. A lot of companies aren't ready to ungate even less switch their KPIs from #'s of leads (contacts) over to a number of engagements for X sector, account, etc.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
RollWorks is helping us adapt an ABM strategy. More so, and as ABM experts, RollWorks is truly championing the enablement of our team to an ABM strategy.

all_reviews.review_title: Rollworks ABM
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Rollworks has a lot of the features that other platforms like 6sense, DemandBase and Terminus have but at a lower price. They are making efforts to improve the platform with new releases like Google Analytics integrations. In terms of display advertising capabilities, it is in line with the others for target account matching and ad deliverability.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I don't like the way the intent is set up with a limited number of topics, I prefer how 6sense and others do this by using keywords and related keywords. I found that a small number of topics (changes based on plan) can't possibly cover all of the intent that a company needs when targeting several different personas.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are targeting departments and personas at specific companies. We can track the effectiveness of our display advertising and how this is impacting revenue.

all_reviews.review_title: As the manager of ABM for my company, I couldn't live without RollWorks. It SIMPLY WORKS!!!!!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I truly LOVE the support I get in learning this 'new-to-me' tool. I was a bit overwhelmed at first as I've never used this one before. But Brandon Lee has been STELLAR to work with. He's shown me just how helpful the tool is. His calm demeanor and expertise in all of the workings, programs, options, reports, and even integrated tools (like SFDC) are extremely helpful. Brandon has made himself extremely accessible to me. I have called upon him many times in the past, sometimes 2 to 3 times a week, with questions or virtual meetings. Being new to this tool, he has displayed incredible patience with me. I wouldn't be where I'm at with RollWorks had it not been for Brandon. Thank you very much, Brandon!!!!

These are the things that set the tool apart from other tools:
- The tool is incredibly helpful. The options therein empower the user to have a much farther reach of Brand Awareness and marketing than just doing things manually or the old-fashioned way.
- Once you learn how to navigate the GUI, and understand how they organize things, it's straightforward to be able to implement campaigns at both the account level, and the contact level.
- The programming of campaign management is very easy to keep track of. You have everything you need all in one place.
- One of my favorite parts is being able to measure at the account level, and not just the contact level.
- And my favorite part...They make measuring performance very easy.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I wish Brandon was local. I've had to learn tools from many enterprise companies in the past and they usually always send a real-person to instruct on how to use these new tools. Because of Covid, I can only meet virtually.

Recommendations to others considering RollWorks Account-Based Platform:
For those who are new to this product, use your success manager! It is a MUST! He or She can help you navigate the tool, and if you tell them your objectives, they can tell you how to get what you need done, and perhaps even help you optimize your overall strategies! Success managers are a MUST!

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Having to navigate the new UI is a little challenging for me. I know you guys did it to benefit the user, but I find it a little harder to navigate, to be honest. But maybe it's just me?

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're working to push into both expansion and net-new accounts at the account level. Being able to track who we're running ads to along their journey stage in system has been powerful for us.

all_reviews.review_title: Best in Class for ABM Targeted Ads
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
RollWorks delivers a strong targeting platform with minimal junk/verification traffic compared to other vendors. Their team is quick to help with both services and support and is very flexible with adapting to our needs.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
We operate in a unique 1:1 targeting strategy at a very large scale. Most platforms are not built for this, so the operational side of updates, budget, etc. can be challenging. That being said, we have found RollWorks to be the best in this department regardless.

Recommendations to others considering RollWorks Account-Based Platform:
Consider using RollWorks to grow with you as you scale. They can meet your needs from experimenting to full execution across hundreds off thousands of accounts which makes the barrier to entry much easier than other vendors.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use RollWorks to deliver messaging and content to specific accounts and people within those accounts. We have found that targeting people by email address is highly successful.

Tracking of unaware, aware and engaged accounts. This shows us what accounts are lighting up, which ones to prioritize and deprioritize.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Audience matching takes longer than I would like.

Recommendations to others considering RollWorks Account-Based Platform:
First, get a strong handle on your ICP and your target accounts list (TAM) and enrich and score target accounts on an account basis, and rank them.

Aligning ABM resources to customers with greatest propensity to buy. By enriching and ranking my target accounts, I can then use RollWorks ABM to put the emphasis on the top scoring accounts, and allocate spend accordingly.

all_reviews.review_title: The product is great, but the service is why we stay
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Most companies say they are customer obsessed, but it's the standout few that go above and beyond for their customers. These are the companies that distinguish themselves over the long term because a customer doesn't feel as if they are just a wallet to be mined for cash. The service we receive from our Rollworks success team is just what you hope for when you choose a technology partner.  She is smart, friendly and above all, responsive.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
The platform requires some degree of training and orientation to use it properly and it's not intuitive as to how things work.  Would love to see a better UI.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have a huge TAM and Rollworks helps us whittle down the many different audiences we could target to the select ones that are the perfect market for our company.  It helps us conserve our ad dollars and use them to best effect and maximum effectiveness.

Just start using it!

There's no way my clients could afford an ad on CNN.com, but with Roll Works, they can be seen by browsers worldwide.

all_reviews.review_title: Rollworks AB Platform Review
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Easy integration with Salesforce and the ability to use Salesforce fields as parameters to choose who to market to and who to avoid. Even custom fields, which I love.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Not as easy to find information on and target individuals as I would like, but pretty sure the privacy features people have on their browsers make individualization difficult.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Building brand awareness and the ability to track engagement so we can target specific companies with more targeted 1:1 messaging is extremely beneficial.

all_reviews.review_title: Doesn't provide all capabilities promised.
all_reviews.review_content:

The ability to have complete control over your campaigns and a plethora of data available. It is great for getting initial research on an audience.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Although I know Rollworks has many capabilities and reporting, I don't feel like everything has been revealed to us. Also, we receive very little guidance when asking for recommendations on campaigns and audiences.

Recommendations to others considering RollWorks Account-Based Platform:
Communicate very clear expectations to your account manager and set manageable goals.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have started to use Rollworks more as initial research for campaigns since it has great information on audience activities. It allows us to get a better understanding of our audiences and their needs/preferences before launching the other campaign tactics.

all_reviews.review_title: Endless Opportunities!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
RollWorks provides a clean platform that's easy to utilize. There are many strategies & tactics to deploy which make the tool so powerful. RollWorks offers targeting capabilities across the entire buying cycle from awareness to conversion. What's more - targeting can get very granular and focused for the most specific, personalized campaigns. I love adding persona targeting parameters along with intent data. I've also been pleased with recent improvements RollWorks has made regarding integrations with HubSpot and Journey Stage Analysis.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
RollWorks is a very robust tool that's taken a while to fully digest and understand. Our Account Manager is awesome, however, and has helped us tackle opportunities one at a time. The UX is very clean, but I've found myself lost between playbooks & campaigns. Thankfully, I know the RW product team is working on updates to the structure/navigation, which should help drastically.

Recommendations to others considering RollWorks Account-Based Platform:
Get on the ABM train now. The potential is extreme.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
I'm using RollWorks for programmatic advertising to specific accounts in our ICP. The targeting capabilities ensure our dollars are being spent to go after the right accounts, unlike many other tools. Following awareness, we're using RW to drive interest and engagement through the funnel via retargeting and contact targeting efforts. These are proving effective as we're seeing accounts progressively move through the funnel to a level of engagement and interest.

all_reviews.review_title: Great for Retargeting and customer service could be improved.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
- Retargeting was great, the number of impressions was great, hoped-for returns though.
- Running Linkedin campaigns were pretty straightforward. There were also a lot more targeting options.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
- Customer service could be improved. It seemed like every other day a crucial member was on leave or not available.
- The platform in itself had a few issues. It was unusable for a brief period of time.
- Intent topics were a bit limited for our use case.

Recommendations to others considering RollWorks Account-Based Platform:
Research on the intent topics you want to consider and check if it's available in the Bombora platform prior to subscription.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Display Advertising mostly.
The exposure of the display ads is certainly a benefit due to Bombora's internet reach. But then again the intent topics were limited.

all_reviews.review_title: Rollworks Product Review
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I love the granularity we can see with account engagement reporting - specifically the Page URL (Unique Visitors, Pageviews) detail. I feel much more in control vs. previous ABM platforms we've used.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Product updates do not seem to be communicated to our account team, therefore not communicated to our team. We often run into tech issues or glitches that make me feel like I'm beta testing for an early-stage startup. I understand prioritizing how you can add value is essential, but it feels less critical when heavy users constantly hit roadblocks.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Rollworks has been able to help us move our client towards a continuous prospecting ABM campaign vs. short, bi-annual campaigns that we didn't receive reporting for until a month after campaigns have ended. Being able to apply changes with the real-time results we're seeing has been a game-changer.

all_reviews.review_title: Solid Solution - Efficient Ad Spend
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Because of the AdRoll network tie-in, we enjoy efficiencies with our ad spend, which was not the case with our previous ABM platform. Support is strong, and the platform is generally easy to work with.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
We continually have issues with reach on our campaigns, and often receive conflicting advice. "The lists are too small," "the lists are too big or not targeted enough," really it seems like no one actually knows. When we do reach our targets, performance is solid, so we'd love to be better at reaching a much higher percentage of target accounts. We also have issues with markets outside the US - performance is certainly degraded in Australia, for example, despite what they say in sales.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted a solid ABM platform to help us advertise to our target accounts, with a particular focus on awareness, funnel acceleration, and expansion.

all_reviews.review_title: ABM & Retargeting Tool For Beginners
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I love that you can set up a targeting audience to automatically be shown different ads based on an action/ set criteria. It is the level of personalization you can include in your strategy that is so powerful!

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I use the HubSpot integration and the data shared for reporting is lackluster. Compared to competitors it is missing targeting options --such as keyword search audiences.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?

all_reviews.review_title: Awesome ABM tool, Amazing Customer Service
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
We are using RollWorks for multiple marketing programs (retargeting, intent data, etc.)  and have a direct sync with our HubSpot account. The platform is easy to use and allows us to target our ABM lists, which is a massive part of our marketing strategy. We've also really been able to dive into the intent data and action off of it, which has proven fruitful for our team. I had limited ABM experience before using RollWorks, but our Account Manager has made it so easy to not only get up to speed but also diving into performance and ways we can optimize our accounts/targeting.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Navigating the platform can sometimes be difficult, but once you have found what you are looking for, it is easy to find again.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Delivering highly targeted and personalized ABM campaigns. We can reach a larger audience, which is not something that we've been able to do with other platforms we use.

all_reviews.review_title: Must-have for your marketing stack
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
We are currently using RollWorks for 3 programs: to retarget website visitors; to retarget based on intent data; and t directly target an ABM list.  We have the integration with HubSpot set up and I use lead scoring to dynamically create the ABM list which auto-synchs to RollWorks.  I can also see in HubSpot what accounts are being retargeted, etc.  This program takes some time and mind muscle to optimize and I'm grateful for my account manager Victoria who is amazing!  As a customer, I'm regularly invited to briefings on product enhancements and new features and I'm impressed with the rate at which RollWorks is developing their product.  I'm also encouraged that they are now focusing on the integration with HubSpot (and other MAS)  which will continue to increase the value of the solution.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I don't really dislike anything -- I'd buy RollWorks again!

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Pretty much our entire buying cycle is digital, even before Covid it was mostly online.  We needed a way to re-engage with different audiences, particularly website visitors, especially as Google Retargeting is not great for B2B.  RollWorks has increased the engagement with our website and content, and it helps us move unnamed prospects through the marketing funnel and into a sales process.

all_reviews.review_title: Awesome product, great customer service
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Starting working with RollWorks, I was a long-time marketer with no direct ABM experience. Taking on my new role, I was suddenly required to closely manage ABM. The team at RollWorks was extremely helpful in their onboarding, explaining both how to use the product and how to communicate about it internally.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Some of the platform seems to be in "beta" - certain reporting views don't support certain audience types, and there is not an easy way to pull reports on ad creative performance, for instance. The team at RollWorks has been very helpful in helping us pull reports manually, but having those reports built into the system would be better.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
RollWorks is our main ABM partner, a pillar of our marketing strategy. We are still in early stages, but we are already beginning to effectively drive pipeline.

all_reviews.review_title: Their customer service team is quite receptive to hearing about issues
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
It has a fairly simple and easy-to-use interface, which allows anyone to access and use the system in a fairly simple way and without major inconveniences, another aspect that I really liked was the fact that it provides me with detailed information through their reports on the consolidated of my sales and also come with graphics included for a better understanding of it. Their customer service team is quite receptive to listening to the problems that arose during the use of the system and they also managed to solve everything in a fairly short period of time (less than 20 minutes, I was simply amazed). Another thing that I really like is the fact that I can make email sending automations, which allows me to create a distribution list among my contacts and send information to their emails, in addition, there is the fact that thanks to this system I can also search for people who fit the profile of my ideal buyer to offer my products directly.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Although the reports have a good structure, I think that they can be improved, that is, show all the information in the same report to be more practical, since at first they can be difficult to understand.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
I decided to implement it in my company as an additional tool that will help me increase the sales of the business, since I consider they have been somewhat weak, after implementing it in the business I could see a considerable and highly noticeable improvement in sales and everything the process in how they were carried, since now they not only see the buyer as another buyer, but also as a person, and I believe that thanks to this tool I have involved him more in my company thanks to his mailing lists , where I have been able to provide you with all the information you need about our products. Really, this system seems quite complete for everything that has to do with sales management.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Pricing is pretty high for the ABM version which gives you an account manager, there was also a high turnover where we had several account manager in a few months period.

Recommendations to others considering RollWorks Account-Based Platform:
RollWorks is a pretty Robust tool and with considering to match with your ABM strategy, unfortunately for us the overhead on top of the ad spend was to high to continue  and although we had some turnover all the account manager were very knowledgeable and helpful. I did expect more partnership around creative pricing for us as we are 1 product line within a larger company and needed a diffrent pricing model which was not flexible.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
the main purpose was retargeting , getting infant of our target accounts raising awareness and warming them up to visit our site. we have found that conversions from ads was very low(click through)  however they did show some good results with click views of people who them came back on their own to the site within a few days of seeing the ad. we still had issues with timing back the ROI and showing the impact on the business.

all_reviews.review_title: Account management not great; product doesn't seem to do what it says it  does
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
It's fairly easy to upload ads and add tracking urls.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Account managers are difficult to get time with. Doesn't seem. like we're actually getting the white glove experience that we were promised (and are paying for!). There's little to no visibility into roadmap. We're told we're going to get intent and website deanonymization, but have not seen any progress on that. Lack of communication is frustrating.

Recommendations to others considering RollWorks Account-Based Platform:
Make sure you really know how they are targeting (IP based is dead right now). Understand exactly what your account management will look like and how often you'll have live calls with the team. Be sure you get in-depth demos of the reporting and how you can track website behavior.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're using it to reach our target accounts through digital. No benefits so far. Our employees are seeing the ads.

all_reviews.review_title: RollWorks: Essential ad tech for any ABM program
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
RollWorks technology allows us to serve millions of impressions to the right decision-makers across our target account list. A key metric to any ABM program is creating awareness among your accounts and the platform allows us to do that. We also use their integration into SalesForce to serve custom messaging to accounts based on where they fall in our pipeline. And last but not least, our account manager is top-notch!

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
While the platform has undergone lots of improvements since I started working with them over a year ago,  I would like to see most robust reporting on the health of the program. I also think having integrations with platforms like Engagio could unlock a ton of potential in targeting across cookies and devices.

Recommendations to others considering RollWorks Account-Based Platform:
I recommend using this product to anyone who is looking at add their first layer of personalization for a ABM program.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use RollWorks to solve pipeline problems. A tool like this helps us move key accounts through the marketing pipeline. They are primarily a top of the funnel play, but with their SalesForce integration, we can serve specific messaging regardless of where they fall in the pipeline.

all_reviews.review_title: Cost-effective way to target specific company and more
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
The ability to provide specific target companies to deliver ads is key for us. Integration with Salesforce gives us the ability to specify different accounts that we either want to target or exclude, and the integration allows this to happen automatically as statuses change in our Salesforce instance for different accounts. Beyond the Rollworks interface itself, the account team is invaluable in helping you get going quickly and to help you optimize your campaigns to reach your goals.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
The interface can be a little confusing at first,  but once you get over that hurdle you're in good shape. Would like the ability to drill down a bit more in some of the reports in Salesforce, but you can create your own reports in SF.

Recommendations to others considering RollWorks Account-Based Platform:
If you're looking for an effective way to reach specific companies using advertising, give Rollworks a look

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were having a challenge getting our brand in front of a specific set of users at specific companies, and Rollworks allows us to achieve the frequency and accuracy we need, while making it cost-effective.

all_reviews.review_title: Great experience with RollWorks
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
We're able to closely target key accounts, saving from wasted spend. RollWorks has been key for getting in front of target accounts, nurture existing leads, and retarget our existing customers. The customer support is fantastic, offering us feedback on how to improve our existing campaigns and further maximize our ROI. We've also started to integrate RollWorks data into our attribution software, providing great insight into how RollWorks combines with other channels to drive pipeline.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
A contract is required to begin using the platform so we were not able to try out the platform prior to committing to a longer term engagement. A minimum monthly spend is required as well. Not a huge set back in hindsight as we've seen incredible results with RollWorks.

Recommendations to others considering RollWorks Account-Based Platform:
Leverage your account manager. They have incredible insight that will help you to improve your campaigns.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're using RollWorks to support our ABM and customer focused campaigns. We have the option of uploading lists of customer contact email addresses or domains or sync directly from Salesforce. RollWorks provides very robust reporting and has multiple reports and dashboards available from within Salesforce. This makes it very easy for our Sales and Executive teams to keep up-to-date with progress and highlights of these campaigns.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
review_question_answers.answer: We're able to closely target key accounts, saving from wasted spend. RollWorks has been key for getting in front of target accounts, nurture existing leads, and retarget our existing customers. The customer support is fantastic, offering us feedback on how to improve our existing campaigns and further maximize our ROI. We've also started to integrate RollWorks data into our attribution software, providing great insight into how RollWorks combines with other channels to drive pipeline.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
review_question_answers.answer: A contract is required to begin using the platform so we were not able to try out the platform prior to committing to a longer term engagement. A minimum monthly spend is required as well. Not a huge set back in hindsight as we've seen incredible results with RollWorks.

We have the option of uploading lists of customer contact email addresses or domains or sync directly from Salesforce. RollWorks provides very robust reporting and has multiple reports and dashboards available from within Salesforce. This makes it very easy for our Sales and Executive teams to keep up-to-date with progress and highlights of these campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: Fantastic platform and even better team
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
The targeting we're able to get to with our campaigns is unparalleled. Between looking at intent based on pages viewed, layering in in-house marketing/CRM data, and RollWorks' proprietary AI, I'm confident our ads are being shown to the correct people.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Only downside is something any growing organization would come up against as it relates to server space. As we have a massive amount of data that can be pulled from RollWorks, when trying to look at large datasets in one place, the server isn't always able to keep up and means we have to compile smaller snapshots to get the full picture.

all_reviews.review_title: RollWorks is a great tool for Display Account-Based Marketing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
RollWorks is a great tool we use to supplement our display advertising (the other main platform we use for display is Google). RollWorks has an intuitive and easy to use platform that gets our ABM campaigns to the right target accounts and has proven results.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
The implementation and on-boarding team lacks technical knowledge you would expect them to have. There is also a lack of connectors and integrations with partners.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
RollWorks runs our entire ABM program and also is a key tool in our display retargeting platform mix. We have found RollWorks to be an easy to use and effective tool for display and ABM marketing campaigns.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
The breadth and depth of the leads we've received far exceeded my expectations.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Positive replies can be somewhat deceiving as some come through indicating that they are not the correct contact for their organization. Most times, these respondents will provide names of the correct contact, which makes introductions much easier as we're able to reference a specific contact at the organization.

Recommendations to others considering RollWorks Account-Based Platform:
I'd recommend consulting with the Growlabs support staff to ensure the quality of your emails meets their recommendations from a best practices standpoint.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Qualified lead-gen can be challenging, but with Growlabs, we've secured countless quality contacts and have closed many new sales deals, which by the way has more than paid for the service.

all_reviews.review_content:

all_reviews.review_content:

Not only is the platform robust with strong deliverable rates, adopting/following best practices from our coach has increased our effectiveness in all areas. In addition to the GrowLabs database search, the use of the Chrome connector enables us to search via corporate url, which is very handy and effective.

all_reviews.review_title: Top of the Line Programmatic Display Tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
The robust capabilities, dedicated account management, and design services make getting started with RollWorks not as cumbersome as it could be. Programmatic display is a monster, so it's worthwhile to have a vendor that acts as a partner in the process.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Onboarding can be a challenge no matter what. I feel like they could do a better job of understanding their client's knowledge of programmatic display from the beginning, then filling in the blanks. After a year in, I am still learning things that I wish had been explained from the start.

Recommendations to others considering RollWorks Account-Based Platform:
Clean up the reporting dashboard to make it easier for admins to use and understand. Concentrate on really teaching customers with programmatic display entails during onboarding instead of only focusing on what's needed for launch.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Targeting sales-selected ABM accounts and contacts by serving them display ads.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
We've used Rollworks primarily for account based marketing capabilities, which helps us build brand awareness among target accounts. Unfortunately, after months and tens of thousands of dollars in ad spend, Rollworks wasn't able to come even close to the success we were seeing with LinkedIn's ABM targeting.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Reliance on view-through conversions-this metric is probably fine for large companies with brand building budgets, but for a smaller company with budgets dedicated primarily to direct response, impressions aren't what matters.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We chose Rollworks to be able to market to target accounts, which we have been able to do (and we're able to see which companies are seeing our ads through the salesforce dashboard). The main problem is that RollWorks isn't driving leads nearly as efficiently as other platforms.

Solving a number of lead generation challenges. Quality leads. Getting the email. Hitting the masses. For us, 10 sales out of 2000 credits makes it worth it to continue using the platform and I believe that would be the case for others making the leap.

all_reviews.review_title: A great complement to other digital marketing channels
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
Rollworks seems to have a good selection of placements across multiple networks, which makes it easy to appear like you're everywhere to prospects who've previously visited your site and haven't converted.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
It's an advanced feature, but I wish it was easier to automate the process of pushing granular conversion data into my marketing automation so I have more detail around what's driving view-through conversions. Right now, it's a manual process to load this report data and ensure that our Rollworks campaigns are getting partial credit for driving engagement.

Recommendations to others considering RollWorks Account-Based Platform:
Make sure to check in regularly with the team at Rollworks and ensure that you have a good feedback loop going with what works and what isn't to ensure that they can help you to optimize your campaigns.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted to ensure that we were present on as many different channels as we possibly could. Rollworks gave us another channel that we could us to  both prospect and retarget the right audience.

all_reviews.review_title: Performed best in unbiased, controlled test against all other lead intel platforms
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I did a test of Growlabs versus all other lead intelligence platforms. Note that I only use Growlabs as a lead intelligence tool, not for outreach. In the test, Growlabs had on average 57% more perfect quality leads than the next leading competitor, when controlled for industries, geography, job titles, and field availability, for leads that are Director-grade and up. This means that in my test, all platforms had an equal and fair chance. Growlabs blew the rest out of the water in terms of being able to find accurate information for leads that are Director-level, VP-level, C-level, SVP/EVP, Partner, Owner, or President. I think this is because of the variety of sources it gathers information from. If you are going to buy some other system, Growlabs probably already sources from it. That amount of information, cross-referenced and verified in the ever-growing Growlabs database, results in an average of 57% more perfect quality leads than any other system can offer. If you email me at josh@factoryfour.com, I can even share my study with you.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I don't like how you can't search for companies (or "accounts") - you can only search for leads. With an Account-Based Marketing strategy (ABM), we would like to be able to search for ideal companies first, then choose leads from those companies. Growlabs only lets you search for leads though. Our current workaround is to search for companies in LinkedIn Sales Navigator, then put their web addresses into an Excel sheet, then upload that sheet to Growlabs and it find the leads at those companies. This process takes me about 30 minutes every time I go to make a lead list, but it's well worth it because of the drastically greater high quality lead volume I get from Growlabs versus other systems that let you search by company.

Recommendations to others considering RollWorks Account-Based Platform:
Before choosing a lead intel platform, whether on a free trial or a live demo, run a test across the different target audiences that you will be engaging and see which platform gives you the highest number of high quality, verified leads in each segment. That is the only true test of such a platform, and a very simple one to perform. If you get any pushback, then the company is clearly worried about their data quality.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Growlabs helps me automate the process of gathering lead intelligence. Using Growlabs, I have completely automated what I used to spend 4 days a week doing. I now spend about 30 minutes a week doing it.

all_reviews.review_title: Growlabs Review
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
The targeting and segmentation options are fantastic in Growlabs. In addition to using the growlabs search and filter options, but you can also bring your own data. Being able to export lead data to other marketing automation platforms has been great. It's also amazing to be able to upload lead data to custom remarketing lists on FB and other display networks.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
There is a learning curve to Growlabs like any other platform. I wish I would have known more of the delivery factors ahead of time and what type of content not to include in the email sequences. The reporting is good, but could be better - I know they have lots of reporting upgrades coming soon though.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Growlabs is a good channel for our lead funnel which supplements our internet advertising and SEO campaigns. We sold 4 deals from our three month Growlabs campaign.

all_reviews.review_title: Attractive and easy to use, it's the right product for me but not everyone at our company
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
The support and success team at Growlabs is excellent, they respond very quickly to questions and problems. The email marketing communication you receive from them is also very on point, easy to digest and often entertaining.
It's easy to navigate around the interface and building lists is extremely easy, and quite attractive. The product delivers a good number of contacts, even in the social services and nonprofit world, where other competitors seem to struggle.
Building email sequences is simple, again with an attractive and intuitive interface.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
There are a few bugs in their interface, specifically around building email templates and adding links or images with links.
Phone numbers are not available for all contacts which is a serious downside, especially in Canada with CASL legislation.
Contacts are not pushed to Salesforce until they have been sent an email, something that is frustrating to some of the salespeople in our company. Again, this is an issue around CASL, which requires permission to send emails in Canada.

Recommendations to others considering RollWorks Account-Based Platform:
Overall, this is a good product that is easy to use, performs well and is and nice to look at.
During the sales process make sure you are clear about asking for a sample list to make sure the product is a good match for you.
If you are looking for phone numbers first, this is not the right choice for you right now. They are rolling them out across their contact database so it might be a good choice in the near future.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
We've only just gotten started with Growlabs and are already better understanding the scope of our market.

all_reviews.review_title: A brilliant tool to help you scale your sales and business development activity and processes.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I love how easy Growlabs is to implement. It took us less than an hour to not only understand it, but to implement the system. all_reviews.review_title: Amazing platform. Easy to use. Great conversion results!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I have been using Growlabs to source leads for some of my portfolio companies. Each of my companies have come away loving the platform. They had much higher quality leads that were far more accurate than any other systems they tested. I don't know where they get all of their data from but they do a great job of refreshing the data as well. Their outreach engine is also very powerful. They know when to send emails so they have a higher chance of being opened. It also only gets sales reps involved when the lead is warm (there is a response) so reps waste way less time on pure lead gen.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
I just wish they had more features. They helped a few of my companies develop inside sales rep strategies and it would be cool to see some of that knowhow be translated into more tools for the reps.

Companies using Growlabs have been able to source high quality leads while reducing reps time on cold leads. More revenue and less man-hours required = win!

all_reviews.review_title: Great leads
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
It's great getting warm leads for the sales team and having certified contacts at organizations we want to work with. The software can do the power of weeks worth of cold emailing in a matter of no time.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
No problems yet. Everything has worked well. Sometimes we will get a response from someone saying they forwarded the email to the correct contact but that is to be expected. Task and titles vary among organizations and it's impossible to be able to tell exactly who the right person is to email at each company or organization. Sometimes, in our industry, we work with facilities managers, sometimes is a GM, and sometimes we are supposed to get through to a finance person.

Recommendations to others considering RollWorks Account-Based Platform:
Use it! It's a great tool and can help anyone in any industry. We have been so happy with it so far and out ramping up our involvement in the program.

What problems is RollWorks Account-Based Platform solving and how is that benefiting you?
Warm leads. Contacts with people that are interested in our services. It takes so much time for a human to track down leads and certify contacts and the program cuts out all that work and sends a professional email to the right people. We have already closed several deals from the leads we have generated from GrowLabs leads. It's been a great tool that has helped our sales team. Excited to keep using this tool and seeing other ways it can help our company.

What do you dislike about RollWorks Account-Based Platform?
It is challenging to stay organized within the platform.  Something that would be hugely beneficial for companies who are trying to use this to scale would be the ability to organize email sequences, email templates, and audiences into editable folders and sub folders.

The ability to generate and export reports at both a high level and a more granular level would be beneficial from a decision maker perspective.
